website_summaries.verdict: Vented dryer that's generously sized for family use, but with a small footprint.
pros: Generous 9kg capacity without taking up too much room
Venting prevents you from having to remove water bin
Quick drying, once you get a handle on the settings
cons: Consumes more energy than other options

customer_reviews.title: Candy a little gem ...
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start with my praise for the Candy tumble Dryer...Such a good price for, what I think, is such a good product, very easy to use and very sturdy, ..I dry my laundry outdoors most of the time but on weeks like this when it’s endlessly pouring with rain ..Candy is a little godsend...delivery was very good the driver kept me informed of where he was. And bought the tumble dryer into the kitchen where I wanted it and took the old one away...Extremely pleased 😀
customer_reviews.author: AnnG

customer_reviews.title: Work's straight from the off
customer_reviews.text: Had tumble dryers for years but were always,"to big", or"too small" or, "too hot" or"to cold", but this one appears to be "spot on", looks good, works great, like it! a lot!!
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 star if smart touch wasn't useless
customer_reviews.text: Not much to say really great product with fast delivery. The only reason I didn't give it full marks was that the smart touch feature is absolutely pointless however i had no idea smart touch existed until it arrived so i guess nothing lost.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Arrived really quick and I love it. There's 6 of us all together and we go through a lot of laundry, this keeps up lovely and the different material options means nothing shrinks or the elastic doesn't go funny, plus with the crease refresh option, I get away with a lot less ironing.
customer_reviews.author: Ella

customer_reviews.title: Quick drying
customer_reviews.text: Dries clothes super quick even full loads. I dont really know how to use it just put ever thing on mixed whites and then press the button that dries to 'ready to wear' dryness and a full load dries in about 40 mins
customer_reviews.author: Jenxx

customer_reviews.title: Happy with this.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. pleasant delivery service the two gentlemen were very helpful asking where it would be easiest to put the tumble dryer for us. Set up straight away as wee had a backload of washing. It seems to be a great dryer for the money.
customer_reviews.author: susan c.

customer_reviews.title: Street partys quiter
customer_reviews.text: This review prob wont go anywhere but stuff it il write it anyway. I missed delivery date tues so rang the number who rang me and the guy said itl be there tomorrow between 7am and 11am. Wednesday 11.15am came and nothing so emailed them to find out nothing was arranged and they had to arrange it for saturday. It came saturday and finally got it fitted to find that it sounds like someones inside kicking and screaming to get out. So much for 68db my compressor at 92db is quiter. Not tried drying yet in case my floor falls through.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good machine
customer_reviews.text: Controls took a little time to get used too but once we figured it out it’s easy to use, the only thing I can think could improve it would be a countdown timer,we purchased one and keep it with the dryer
customer_reviews.author: edward b

customer_reviews.title: I’m happy.
customer_reviews.text: Only had my new dryer for 3 days and so far so good! It’s quieter than my last one, which I’d had for 20 years, and has lots of new options to choose from, my other was quite basic in comparison. Easy to install and used it straight away. Clothes are dry and smell fresh. Roomy drum. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Annette

customer_reviews.title: Arrived faulty EXTREMELY LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Arrived damaged tried it anyway and sounds like its going to blow up !!!! Extremely loud but ao are replacing and taking the faulty away so I will review the undamaged item once received
customer_reviews.author: Jenna mikey

customer_reviews.title: Works but settings not clear
customer_reviews.text: Ok but the clothes never seem to be dry so I have to put it on several times and probably for too long which costs a fortune
customer_reviews.author: Vikirock36

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, smart machine, will take a little while to work out the different programs. But I'm a bit behind when it has more than 2 buttons. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tony P.

customer_reviews.title: Register you guarantee
customer_reviews.text: Not happy bumping noises but onto the supply people for advice
customer_reviews.author: BigJohn

customer_reviews.title: It dries clothes.
customer_reviews.text: Great item. Does what I need it to do and probably lots more that I haven’t figured out yet. It dries clothes well but please read the label on the front that says you must change the filter after each use.
customer_reviews.author: supastevo

customer_reviews.title: Again value for money
customer_reviews.text: It's been one of the best items I have bought from amazon it was very nice and easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Paul si gh

customer_reviews.title: Faulty machine
customer_reviews.text: Tumble dryer delivered 1/10/2019 never worked properly from the start, finally broke down December 2019, still waiting to get it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: nigel saunders

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Nice dryer with loads of settings and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived on time ,had messages from delivery men to keep me informed ,as for the dryer ,so far so good ,it has 12 drying programs + it can be operated via smart phone ,it's a lot quieter than my last dryer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Slightly noisy, but works great
customer_reviews.text: Light enough to install on your own. Works great and quickly dries, although its quite noisy.
customer_reviews.author: HRH Prince of Wales

customer_reviews.title: No degrees setting
customer_reviews.text: Dryer built well just no heat settings even though it states 60 degrees to 220 degrees it doesn't give you option .I wouldn't have bought it knowing what I know now
customer_reviews.author: Kyle tansley

customer_reviews.title: My first ever candy product is surprisingly great
customer_reviews.text: This is a big tumble dryer. Loads of room to dry more in one load without greatly increasing time. Louder than I though but not an issue. I would buy candy again.
customer_reviews.author: Uk247

customer_reviews.title: I'm sure the dryer will be fine !!!
customer_reviews.text: I would love to comment but the dryer has not been delivered yet.Oops
customer_reviews.author: David Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Need a manual how to operate machine
customer_reviews.text: Do not understand machine workings, it sometimes does a cool dry and sometimes turns itself off
customer_reviews.author: Chris Clayton

customer_reviews.text: Don’t buy bought this 9 months ago and is now broken , not worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s efficient and cares for clothes
customer_reviews.text: Once you get used to the settings it works super efficiently! The clothes come out ready to fold and not overheated and damaged.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa bingham

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice and better than original . 4star only coz finger print for unlocking phone doesnt work but other than that its really looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Fingerprint didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Did not work! Put on and It wouldn't read my fingerprint, even turned on touch sensitivity. Don't recommend
customer_reviews.author: Pamela McWilliams

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money - these provide no protection
customer_reviews.text: Cracked within days of use; replaced it with the 2nd one in package and that cracked too
customer_reviews.author: Karen Tyner

customer_reviews.title: not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Did not fit and wouldn't stay in place. Returned it.
customer_reviews.author: chris neri

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy if you use fingerprint feature
customer_reviews.text: Fingerprint scanner does not work with this screen cover. I followed instructions and increased sensitivity settings. Will return.
customer_reviews.author: anc8208

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Bought this my daughter, nothing but trouble, sometimes I works and others not, it's only few weeks old, Candy are no help, just pass the buck,if engineer is came out, I would have to pay call out if it's user error,well my cloths are hanging around the house drying and dryer in the garage,
customer_reviews.author: Ade Hooper

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Dries much faster than my previous dryer, leaves less creases too.
customer_reviews.author: MercOwner

customer_reviews.title: excellent tumble dryer
customer_reviews.text: a bit too complicated for me lots of different settings but dries well
customer_reviews.author: anne

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.text: From start we had a banding noise, told this would go after 12 hours use. It has not gone 5 weeks later. Called for engineer to come out and check it. Waiting to here back from engineer
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Knott

customer_reviews.title: Nackerd
customer_reviews.text: Hi we purchased a dryer from use In July and it has been broke down for the last fortnight can you send me an email address so I can get in touch with somebody for a repair
customer_reviews.author: Charles Tyers

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Not good at all drys for ten minutes then goes off
customer_reviews.author: yvonne
